entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 p.m. EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 6:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
